name: mastercard-cordova-commerceweb
description: This Cordova plugin enables to use  `commerce-web` sdk in a Cordova project. `commerce-web` is a lightweight library used to integrate Merchants with [**EMV Secure Remote Commerce**](https://www.emvco.com/emv-technologies/src/) and  Mastercard's web-based SRC-Initiator. `commerce-web` facilitates the initiation of the checkout experience and returns the transaction result to the Merchant after completion.
author: Mastercard
